## injectBrIntoEmptyParagraphs variable

This utility maps through the SSR element and injects break tags into all empty p tags.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
injectBrIntoEmptyParagraphs: SSRTransformer
```

## Remarks

Prosemirror automatically injects break tags into empty paragraph tags. This causes the document rendered during SSR to be different than when the page loads.
